name: infeCCt - addictive puzzle fun
description:
Over 300 levels of brain training action!

Features:
- Addictive puzzle fun
- Simple rules for a quick start
- Training of intelligence and creativity
- Optimization of thinking processes
- 300 tricky challenges

The simple and genius puzzle infeCCt will get you soon! Train your brainpower in a playful manner. Enter mysterious temple ruins and connect all tiles of the ancient challenges. With blocked tiles, intersections and tunnels, this is not as easy as you might believe. In order to solve each of the numerous and tricky puzzles, you have to think more than one step ahead. But every success also means that your brain can apply previously acquired knowledge to a new situation. Do you want to improve your intelligence? Get infeCCted!

A game by Andreas Skultéti
infeCCt is a registered trademark
